edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.hooks

Class GroupHooks

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.internet2.middleware.grouper.hooks.GroupHooks
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GroupAttributeNameValidationHook, GroupHooksImplExample, GroupUniqueExtensionHook

    public abstract class GroupHooks
extends Object
    Extend this class and configure in grouper.properties for hooks on group related actions
